Question
========
  
It is examined whether the degree of self-regulation is influenced by the degree of self-confidence. Self-regulation and self-confidence are each measured on a 5-point Likert scale. This is an example of: 
Answerlist
----------
* Univariate statistic with self-regulation as dependent variable.
* Univariate statistics with self-regulation as the independent variable.
* Bivariate statistics with self-regulation as dependent variable.
* Bivariate statistics with self-regulation as the independent variable.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
